mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT (PAY_ID, MEMBER_ID, PAY_METHOD, PAY_PRODUCT, PAY_PRICE, PAY_TIME, PAY_STATUS) VALUES (PAY_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{payMethod}, #{payProduct}, #{payPrice}, #{payTime}, #{payStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID AS memberId, PAY_METHOD AS payMethod, PAY_PRODUCT AS payProduct, PAY_PRICE AS payPrice, PAY_TIME AS payTime, PAY_STATUS AS payStatus FROM PAYMENT
